message: Hi Bob – to avoid further devaluation we might as well settle now. Given that waiting hurts me more (20% per round) than you (10% per round), I propose we agree immediately: I receive $4000 and you get $6000. This offer gives you a higher immediate payout than you’d expect if you waited a round to propose your own division. Let’s close this round and secure our shares before the money loses more of its value.
